entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with periods of ice pellets in the evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
